Description: Radiate an enchanting aura of architectural elegance inspiring your allies with improved morale and charisma enhancing their interactions and boosting their confidence.
Temporarily manipulate time to achieve the perfect timing in combat allowing you to react with precision and grace gaining an advantage over your adversaries.
Open a rift to a pocket dimension filled with exquisite furnishings and decor providing a temporary sanctuary for you and your allies to strategize and rejuvenate.
Create a magical barrier resembling intricate blueprints which can protect you and your allies from incoming attacks providing a safe haven for tactical planning and renovation. Damage -1.
Create a mystic floorplan in your mind allowing you to navigate even the most complex environments with ease avoiding traps and hazards while maintaining an air of sophistication.
Focus your renovation magic to mend wounds and restore vitality to yourself or one willing creature you touch. The target regains 2d6 + your Brawny Builder modifier in hit points.
Release a wave of rejuvenating magic that aids several wounded allies. Up to 6 creatures of your choice within 30 feet regain 1d6 + your Brawny Builder modifier in hit points.
Summon a celestial carpet that rolls out dramatically beneath your feet allowing you to glide across the battlefield with audacious style and minor damage to foes in your path.
Unleash a powerful wave of force causing structures and enemies to crumble dramatically dealing substantial damage and creating a spectacle on the battlefield.
Infuse your weapon with elemental aesthetics adding an extra layer of damage with a touch of artistic flair making your attacks both potent and visually stunning.
Transform into a majestic and ethereal form gaining resistance to damage and the ability to move gracefully through obstacles while dealing impressive damage with your attacks.
Exude an aura of glamorous enchantment captivating your foes and reducing their attack accuracy while they are entranced by your presence.
